Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or

Despite a valiant fourthquarter attempt the Virginia Tech womens basketball team wasnt able to pull out a win against the University of North Carolina PERIOD The Hokies lost to the UNC Tar Heels  and fell to  a38 ACC PERIOD

Both teams were coming off of ACC wins Virginia Tech against Virginia and UNC against Boston College PERIOD Prior to this matchup each team was struggling in the ACC with a  record needing this win to save face in the conference PERIOD

The Hokies struggled with shooting in the first  minutes of play PERIOD At the half the Hokies trailed the Tar Heels  going  under the net and  from beyond the arc PERIOD Head Coach Dennis Wolff rotated  players in the first half not allowing the team to get any sort of rhythm or consistency going PERIOD

UNC showcased a strong defense in the first half putting up  defensive rebounds and five blocks PERIOD On offense UNCs sophomore guard Jamie Cherry led the first half with  points two blocks and one steal PERIOD Right behind Cherry was Destinee Walker who contributed  points PERIOD The Hokies trailed the Tar Heels for the entire first  minutes of play PERIOD

It was in the third quarter that the Hokies started to close in on the gap UNC had created PERIOD Going on an  run the margin had been reduced to  PERIOD This was shortly lived however as UNC turned around and went on a  run themselves PERIOD The teams broke even after the third quarter each scoring  points taking the total score to  PERIOD

The Hokies gave their best effort in the fourth quarter going on a ninepoint run started by Chanette Hicks with a fast break in the paint PERIOD The Hokies outscored the Tar Heels  in the fourth quarter but it ultimately wasnt enough PERIOD The Hokies managed to bring the deficit to one trailing  PERIOD Vanessa Panousis went on a run down the court with under  seconds to go but stepped out of bounds and effectively ended the game for the Hokies PERIOD

Hannah Young led the Hokies for the night with  points going  in field goals and  beyond the arc PERIOD Vanessa Panousis trailed Young with  points of her own going  in threepoint shots PERIOD

The Tar Heels relied on consistency from their entire team as four of their players scored in the double digits PERIOD Freshmen Stephanie Watts and Walker led the team with  and  points respectively PERIOD As a team UNC went  in field goal attempts and capitalized on free throw opportunities going  PERIOD

The Hokies will return home to host Pittsburgh on Sunday afternoon at  p.m PERIOD in Cassell Coliseum PERIOD
